DOC.brief_title: Radio Stories About Children 's Healthy Eating Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: Given high rate hypertension obesity minority immigrant community , implement culturally linguistically appropriate health promotion activity improve family ' diet physical activity behavior imperative . `` Radio Stories '' education entertainment strategy significant potential health promotion tool . Through CBPAR process , aim create test effectiveness acceptability `` SoLaHmo Radio Stories '' change knowledge behavior prevent manage hypertension obesity Somali , Latino , Hmong family child . Methods : SoLaHmo community researcher interview 7 family ( 3 Somali , 2 Latino , 2 Hmong ) successfully implement lifestyle change prevent manage hypertension obesity , create 6 `` radio story '' ( 2 per ethnic community ) base family ' experience . To test story , conduct two-arm trial include 146 participant ( obesity : 68 , hypertension : 78 ; 44 Hmong , 49 Latino , 53 Somali participant ) . Effectiveness acceptability program test pre-and post questionnaire . Anticipated Results : Higher rate satisfaction , increase knowledge , increased intention change healthful lifestyle behavior participant receive radio story , compare control group participant , indicate radio story program effectiveness acceptability .
